title: Issue -call volume barely audible. All other volume works fine- speaker, Bluetooth, google asst
content: Volume is extremely low that I can barely hear caller on phone calls. If I use the speaker it works fine. Uninstalled and reinstalled the Google phone call app. Tried using a different Android phone app.  Turned volume up to max.  Nothing resolves this. Problem began since last system update.
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 4 XL
